name: Starship Candyspace
description:
[ Instructions ]

Avoid everything except candy & chocolate

Collect candy to enter candyspace and advance the stage

There is no end

[ Controls ]

WASD / Arrow Keys - Move

Space - Shoot

[ Tools ]

Game engine - Unity

Sounds - BFXR & Audacity

Music - BeepBox https://www.beepbox.co/

Sprites - Aseprite

[ Made in 1 day for Halloween Game Jam ]
